title: Maha Shivratri 2017 Wishes
text:
> Buzz Maha Shivratri 2017: Best Shivratri SMS, WhatsApp & Facebook Messages to send Happy MahaShivaratri greetings! We have shared a list of Maha Shivratri 2017 best Shivratri SMS, WhatsApp & Facebook Messages to send Happy MahaShivaratri greetings to your loved ones! By Zainab Mulla | Updated: February 23, 2017 6:00 PM IST Comments 
Mahashivratri is the ‘Great Night of Shiva’ and this festival will be celebrated on February 24 this year. This auspicious Hindu festival falls on the 13th night and 14th day of the New Moon day according to the Hindu calendar. It is believed that on this day Lord Shiva got married to Goddess Parvati and on the same night he performed the Tandava dance. On this day, devotees observe fast and pray all night long to seek blessings from the Mahadeva. Devotees even offer fruits, flowers and bel leaves on Shiva Linga and pray for their well-being. (When is Mahashivratri 2017: Date, Muhurat, Puja Vidhi, Fasting & Auspicious timings of Shivratri) 
The festival starts with devotees taking the ritual bath and visiting Lord Shiva temple. On the day of Maha Shivratri, there are special puja’s which are conducted and the entire day priest keep on chanting ‘Shivji ki Jai’ and ‘Om Namah Shivaya’. Later on, even married and unmarried women perform traditional puja and worship Goddess Parvati also known as Gaura. In return, Goddess grants them with a good husband and long married life. (Maha Shivaratri 2017: Know the Puja Muhurat, Puja Vidhi & auspicious timings to perform Shiva Puja) 
On the auspicious day of Maha Shivaratri, we have shared a list of 20 messages which you can send across to your loved ones and wish them a very Happy Maha Shivaratri. Make this day even more special by worshipping with all your devotion. Happy Maha Shivaratri 2017. (Maha Shivaratri 2017 messages: Powerful shlokas and mantras to seek divine blessings from Lord Shiva and share on WhatsApp, SMS, Facebook and Twitter)
